thread.title: Austin
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Austin

author: Austin
title: Austin
text:
Would be 5 stars if the order had shipped sooner. Also the free extras, i thought were a full sized jar and grinder, but they are both tiny. The grinder is so so, and had some dinged/scratched off anodization even when brand new.
The product was great, and the packaging was more than adequate.
